name: Sarvesh Kushare
biography: Sarvesh Anil Kushare is an Indian athlete who competes in high jump. He is known for his achievements in national and international competitions, including a silver medal at the Asian Athletics Championships and participation in the 2022 Asian Games.
childhood: Sarvesh hails from a village in Maharashtra, where he learned the basics of athletics under the guidance of his coach, RW Jadhav. His journey in sports began with a focus on high jump, where he faced various challenges but showed great potential.
professional_career: Kushare has made significant strides in his career, including winning a silver medal at the 2023 Asian Athletics Championships and achieving a personal best of 2.27 meters in the Indian National Championship. He is on the verge of qualifying for the Paris 2024 Olympics and has been recognized as one of India's top high jumpers.
